div.p: I think really the awakening was at 15 when I realised that our life was not as perfect as I imagined and discovered I had a father who used to
beat my mother and he was an alcoholic so that was quite traumatic, we ran away from him and we had to go into hiding
for many years so without getting into too much detail it was quite a traumatic shift in terms of what I thought my reality was
to what it then became. What I do take from my upbringing is not just learning what to do but also learning what not to do
what doesn’t work and I think that was an important lesson for me... You know I think if you’ve had a few hard knocks in life
it toughens you up and it makes you a stronger person without a doubt you know and you can deal with the tough stuff then.
